resources.string: Welcome to the Game of Life
This is a simple game where you can create and evolve patterns using Conway's Game of Life rules.
You can drag and drop patterns by holding your finger on one, then dropping it onto the grid.
Draw on the grid by holding your finger down or tapping the cells you want to color!
You can change the animation speed using the slider.
Start the animation by clicking on the start button at the bottom right.
Choose which pattern you want to save
Previous grid content, i.e. from the last launch
